column1: leg break on leg, he pushes to midwicket
tossed up, he gives room and lofts this flat over mid off! What a strike! That is a statement. Long on was back so he went inside out over long off
89kph, length ball, he pushes in defence and gets an inside edge
pushed through on leg, it slides on and he turns this forward of square
full on middle, he drives easily to long on
drifting down leg, he glances this easily with the angle past short fine for three
133kph, full outside off, he steps outside the line and paddle scoops it to wide fine leg for three. He was looking for a shorter length but he still executed it well
135kph, fuller length, he mistimes a drive to mid off
136kph, fuller on leg, it comes off the pad and runs away fine for four leg byes!
pull shot thumped infront of square! 142kph, chest high short ball and an authoritative stroke! He hammered that
fuller on off, he drives with power to mid off
135kph, fuller and shaping down leg, it catches the pad again and runs just past the diving Lenton!
131kph, short and wide, he cuts hard with the angle past backward point! Good shot to place it wide of the sweeper at deep point
131kph, good length, fourth stump, he defends on the front foot
short and wide, very high, he jumps up and cuts to deep point
slower ball, off cutter, jags back and hits the pad, huge appeal but it's given not out. Might have been too high
full angling into leg, he clips this off the toes through midwicket and they call for two immediately
length slower ball, he checks his shot and defends to mid on
Stoinis threatens to back away but it's a dummy, it's back of a length, he punches off the back foot through cover-point
mistimes a straight drive but he got enough of it to beat mid off! This was very full, he didn't nail it but got it well enough

caught at deep square! 122kph, slower ball, he didn't pick it, it was back of a length and in the slot but he got under a pull shot hitting it high to deep square and Sams comes 20 metres in off the rope to catch it well
Lenton drops him down leg! Stoinis gets a life! This was down leg, a tickled leg glance straight off the face goes straight to Lenton and he spills the simple chance!
fuller outside off, he drives to mid off
shorter wide of off, 133kph, he's back and cutting firmly to deep point
thumped in the air straight of mid on! This was clubbed so hard. It was a length ball, he stood up and thumped it flat and just over mid on
143kph, good length wide of off, he leans back and tries to run it to third man but misses
136kph, good length on off, he defends to midwicket
length ball angled into leg, it comes off pad into the off side, he wants one and yells 'Come on man' but Larkin sends him back
138kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he's back and dropping this into the off side for a single
142kph, good length on leg, he tucks this behind square for a single
136kph length outside off, he drives on the up but misses
length ball angled into leg, it hits the thigh pad and drops down and they pinch one
paddle pulled over short fine! Clever shot. It was back of a length outside off, he stepped inside the line outside off and flips it over short fine.
angled down leg, called wide
125kph, fuller length, he drives firmly back to Morris who fields well in his follow through
slower ball on off, he turns this off the front foot to the gap at midwicket
slower ball, length outside off, he pushes this to backward point
good length outside off, he stands up and pushes to cover
138kph, fuller angled into off, he pushes to long on
132kph, fuller outside off, he pushes a drive wide of mid off for a single
fuller on leg, he flicks this off his toes in the air through midwicket, Sams has a long chase running from deep square and he might have done well to save one
fuller outside off, 138kph, he drives firmly to mid off
fuller length, 138kph, he drives inside out to cover
slid through and hits the front pad but it was going down leg
flatter on leg, he stands up to punch to long on but midwicket cuts it off
he punches through cover off the back foot! A pressure release. 90kph, back of a length, he stood up and punched elegantly with power. Great shot to beat the sweeper
90kph, quicker on off, he punches back to the bowler
91kph, arm ball, swinging away, he chips this nicely inside out wide of long off for a couple
pushed through on off, he works this to the gap at midwicket
back of a length outside off, 119kph, slower, he punches to mid off
fuller outside off, he drives well but straight to mid off
square drives with power past point! Too much width, he gave room and caressed on the up past backward point
fuller, 140kph, angled into middle, he clips this forward of square to the gap and they pinch two
141kph, fuller on off, he drives to mid off

Sams drops him at deep square and it goes for four! Short ball on the hip, he pulls high in the air to deep square, Sams ran in too far too early, had to turn and run back with the flight and dropped it and it bounced off his hands and rolled to the rope!
full on off, he drives to cover
89kph, fuller outside off, he drives firmly to long off
90kph, slid through on leg he works this through midwicket
full outside off, he drives firmly to deep point
tossed up on middle, he drives to cover
fractionally wide and he creates room to cuts hard and fine past short third man! Good shot to create the room
off break outside off, he drives firmly to long on
short and he hammers a pull to deep midwicket and McAndrew fumbles it over the rope! He got to it easily but just made a mess of it
91kph, pushed through on off, he's back and forcing back to the bowler
flatter wide of off, he square drives to deep point
back of a length on off, he's back and forcing this to long off
87kph, tossed up outside off, he drives to long off
slower ball outside off, 111kph, he square drives through point
slower ball outside off, 122kph, he pushes to point for one
139kph, good length wide of off, he tries to thrash it through point and misses
fuller angled into off, he drives firmly to cover
133kph, full outside off, he clears the front leg and carves this along the ground to deep cover
slower ball, very slow wide of off, he dabs this behind point for one
length, fourth stump, 124kph, he gives room and cuts to backward point
short and wide, 123kph, he stands up and cuts hard to deep point
short and wide, 123kph, he tries to cut and misses
back of a length, fractionally wide he cuts hard behind point and Ross can't reel it in on the rope!
shorter length outside off, he pulls hard to deep midwicket
short and wide, he reaches out and cuts to deep point to bring up another 50. His 7th score of 50 plus in this BBL
half volley, 90kph, he drives up and over cover! Superb shot but a step hit in the slot

nearly a run out! Stoinis and Larkin run into each other but get away with it! It was pushed to long on, they should have got two easily but they ran into each other, fortunately Hales' throw missed at the non-striker's and no one was there to take the ball!
fuller on leg, he drives to long on
he cuts off a thick edge and it runs fine to third man! It was fractionally short and wide and he gets a boundary, just not by design
slower wrong un, 86kph, he's back and working forward of square
lofted over cover! Again it was tossed up outside off, he lifts this high over cover with power. Excellent shot
pushed well wide of off and called wide
tossed up in the slot and he clears the front leg and thumps this straight to the sightscreen! Great strike
short and wide, he's back and cutting hard past point! Too short and wide
angled into leg, he clips this off the pads to deep midwicket
short and wide, he gives room and hammers this to deep cover
short and wide, he cuts hard to backward point
short and wide, he cuts hard to deep point
full on leg, he clips this through midwicket to the sweeper
shorter length on off, he steps inside the line and pulls this fine! Brilliant thinking to step inside the line
131kph, short and wide and he cuts hard past backward point! He's rolling now! Forced Tremain wider and thumped him behind point
short and wide, outside off, he stand stall and punches to deep cover-point
132kph, full toss outside off, he steps outside off and flicks this behind square for a single
shorter outside off, he steps inside the line and chips a pull to deep square
full outside off, he's back and punching this backward of deep point for two
steps inside and paddles it fine for six! Brilliant skill, to get inside the line in a premeditated fashion and get down on one knee to paddle it over the fence
fuller outside off, he whips this with the angle to deep midwicket
slower ball, outside off, he drives to long on and brings up 50 off 36. His second of the BBL
plays on trying to paddle again! He stepped outside off, to a full ball and tried to paddle it fine again but paddled it onto the top of off!
length slower ball outside off, he's back and pushing this to point
slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
full, angled into leg, he tries to loft down the ground but miscues to midwicket
full wide yorker, he jams it out to cover-point
short slower ball, wide of off, he slices an uppercut off the edge over short third man!
slower ball in the slot, he picks it and lofts beautifully down the ground to the sightscreen!
132kph, full into leg, he flicks this in the air forward of square but for a single only
full on leg, he clips this wide of long on for two
slower ball, he tries to launch but miscues this to long on
length ball outside off, he tries to reverse lap but misses. The slower ball just cut away from him
length ball, 127kph, it bites in the surface, he tries to heave and gets it off the toe through cover-point
length ball outside off, he heaves this through the leg side to the gap at deep midwicket
full outside off, he drives to long off
shorter length outside off, he lifts this up and over cover for a couple
slower ball but too wide of off and just outside the guideline
short slower ball, it sits up, he backs away and slaps it up and over mid off! Great shot
full slower ball in the slot, he lofts this over wide long off! Superb stroke going inside out!
135kph, full and jammed into leg, he backs away and squeezes it out through forward square for a couple
129kph full into leg, he jams it between his legs, a draw shot! But he hits it straight to short fine
133kph, yorker, through the legs and it just misses leg, they pinch a bye
over-pitched, 140kph, he caresses a cover drive into the gap! Superb start. A lovely flowing drive
he advances to a length ball and is hit on the pad, he was way too far down to be given. It pitched outside leg
length ball on leg, he is working this awkwardly off the thick inside edge behind square
shorter wider outswinger, he's back and cutting hard to deep backward point
beaten by a cracking delivery that nips off the seam. He was squared up
back of a length into the hip, he tries to pull but gets taken on the body
tossed up on leg, he clips this to mid on
he advances and drives on the up and drives beautifully wide of mid off but Maddinson makes a diving save
length ball down leg, he sweeps but it comes off glove into Gotch's foot
whipped powerfully behind square and Hinchliffe makes a great save in the deep
darted into leg stump, he's back and working this forward of square, well weighted for two
tossed up on leg, he whips on the front foot forward of square for a couple
fuller outside off, he opens up and hammers this to cover but can't find the gap
brilliant paddle scoop! He did this against the Hurricanes. Full outside off, he steps inside it and scoops it fine
length wide of off, he backs away and cracks this past cover, Maddinson has a task on the rope but he makes the save
length outside off, he's backing away and thumping this to cover and Zampa makes a sensational diving stop to save four!

Has Hales run himself out? Yes he has! He drives to Coulter-Nile at mid on and takes him on, the pick up and release was sensational and he produces a direct hit at the non-striker's and Hales was just short! His bat was almost on the line when the stumps lit up. Superb fielding. The Stars are on in the field
131kph, fuller, he chips this in the air straight of mid on and Maxwell almost gets there! He blocks it on the half volley
dropped at point! This was driven in the air to point, Hinchliffe was diving to his left but he spilled it!
99kph, darted into leg, he's back and working this through midwicket
tossed up on off, he backs away and lofts this up and over cover-point, Hinchliffe has a long chase and just reels it in
flatter outside off, he's back and pulling to wide mid on but the man makes the save
lofted over mid off! He backed away and exposed the stumps but got the step hit length and deposited over mid off. It landed just short of the rope. Outstanding shot
angled into leg, he clips this through midwicket to the man in the deep

Bowled him! Khawaja backed away to try and loft down the ground, Coulter-Nile delivered a length off cutter, he got a little inside edge but it crashed into the stumps. He completely lost his shape trying to go with an angled bat
edged and it flies safely to fine third man. No slip in. It was back of a length and he pushed off the back foot, Rauf does well on the rope
136kph, back of a length outside off, he is back and whipping this to short midwicket
135kph, shorter length on middle, he pulls this off the hip behind square to deep fine leg
133kph, length ball wide of off, he tries to pull and misses
135kph, back of a length on off, he defends with soft hands to backward point for a single
143kph, back of a length outside off, he punches this off the back foot to cover
he drives magnificently through cover! Slightly over-pitched and he used the pace to place it inside out through cover
caught down leg off the glove! A short ball down leg, he tries to pull but it just got on him too quickly, it came off the glove and Gotch moved to his left and took the catch comfortably
141kph, full outside off, he slices a drive through backward point wide of third man and Worrall makes a great save
146kph, good length on off, he backs away and just blocks it straight of mid on with outstanding timing for two
144kph, short into the ribs, he pulls off the gloves to short fine
pushed through outside off, he tries to cut but mistimes to cover
shorter length, he's back and cutting off a thick edge and it flies fine of third man for a couple
fuller, he slog sweeps along the ground wide of long on and a misfield allows two
94kph, quicker on off, he's back and punching to cover and Coulter-Nile is diving to his left but they get one
reverse sweep past point! Good shot, he switched his feet early and slapped it behind point
wrong un, quicker, it hits the pad but it's sliding down leg
137kph, good length, fourth stump line, he's back and defending

dropped by Maddinson running back from backward point! Tough chance. Length ball outside off, he sliced this high behind point backward point, Maddinson runs back and gets two hands to it but spills it
slower ball on off, he's back and working this through square leg
fuller on off, he drives back to the bowler
136kph, short and wide, he uppercuts and it carries over third man! He used the pace and it just cleared Rauf
back of a length, 136kph, he stands up and punches to long on
full on middle, he backs away and square drives to deep point
a drag down and he thumps this over deep midwicket! Superb strike. He hit that so hard. It was bad ball but it was hammered
91kph, fuller on off, he charges and drags a drives to long on
full on leg, he drives hard to long on
full outside off, he cracks a drive straight to cover
hurried through outside off, he tries to cut but it gets onto him quickly
tossed up, he's down to sweep through square leg
tossed up on off, he backs away and drives to long on
quicker and a good length, he charges but has to adjust to defend
advances and lofts this over long on and way back! His footwork got him to the length and he swings through the line and smashes it miles into the stands!
shorter length, he switches his feet to reverse sweep to deep point
pushed through on off, he drives to long off
146kph, he backs away, he follows with a yorker, he drives to long on
145kph, fuller outside off, he's beaten cold, caught on the crease
back of a length, 140kph, he stands up and punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
Bowled him! Morris backs away too far, Rauf goes full, straight and fast and it crashes into leg stump! He was beaten for pace
148kph, attempted yorker, low full toss and he glances this to fine leg
short ball outside off, he tries to pull, it comes off the bottom edge and drops near the stumps and they pinch a single
132kph, good length, top of off, he defends on the front foot
127kph, fuller on leg, he clips this off his pads behind square for a single
133kph, back of a length, takes him on the pad high and they pinch a leg bye
slower ball, 133kph, wide of off, he dabs this wide of third man and they pinch two
129kph, fuller on leg, he drives to long on
shorter length, wider of off, he's back and trying to cut but misses
a high full toss! Just below waist high apparently, he pulls behind square
133kph, outside off, he skips down and drives wide of mid off for one
short slower ball down leg, he pulls powerfully past short fine leg! A bad ball and he smashes it
back of a length, on middle, he pulls forward of square to the sweeper
length ball down leg and pulls this very fine for four more!
top edge nearly flies for six at third man! This was a length ball, he tried to heave this over midwicket, gets a top edge and it nearly goes for six. Third man was inside the circle
shorter length on off, he backs away and cuts hard through point and finds the gap!
92kph, slid through on middle, he's back and cutting behind point to the man in the deep
90kph, tossed up on middle, he drives to long on
shorter length, he's back and cutting to deep point
93kph, he backs away, Zampa follows and Ross punches back to the bowler
full toss, he swats this away through midwicket to the man in the deep
back of a length on off, he's back and pushing this to cover
launched over long on! Fuller and in the slot, he set his base and lofted this high and long over long on
127kph, angled into leg stump, he glances to fine leg
he pushes this slowly to long on and it's perfectly weighted to pinch two
129kph, angled into leg, off cutter, it hit the front pad but was missing leg. Going way down
slower ball off cutter, he works this through midwicket, they want two but Ross slips
141kph, back of a length outside off, he tries to guide to third man but misses
top edge flies over the keeper and just beats fine leg! A short bouncer, he tries to pull, gets a thick edge and it goes safely to the rope
length ball, hammered back at Coulter-Nile, he gets the right hand down and nearly parries it onto the non-striker's stumps! Ross was miles out if it hit
length ball on the hip, he flicks this to fine leg to bring up 50 off 35 balls. His 2nd of the BBL
short slower ball, he backs away to try and run to third man but punches it off the gloves
140kph, length ball outside off, he swings and misses
length leg break, he backs away and heaves this wide of long on into the gap for two
launched over deep midwicket! He backed away and Zampa follows into his arc and he hammers this long over the fence!
pushed way wide of off and it's called

great catch by Maddinson at deep midwicket! Ross went again, it was 100kph, into his hitting arc but he swatted this flat to the long boundary, Maddinson had to run a fair way to his right but he took an excellent diving catch
lofted flat over long on! Full outside off, a step hit and he launches this flat and long again!
holes out to long off! A touch slower with some turn, he skipped down to go again, he sliced it high to long off and Handscomb took the catch easily well inside the rope
edged off the gloves of Gotch! He went back to a shorter length, got a thick edge but it was too thick for the keeper, it came off the top of the gloves and runs away
143kph, length ball on off, he's back and slapping this to deep midwicket
142kph length ball outside off, it stays low, he swings and misses
148kph, fuller, he drives to mid off and takes on the man for a tight single
140kph, back of a length wide of off, he tries to cut but misses
slower ball, brilliant, grips in the surface and he swings and misses again
144kph, shorter length into the body, he mistimes pull behind square

Caught at deep square! Banged in slower ball, he rocked back and hits this high to forward of square, it's a huge hit but it still falls short of the long boundary and Larkin takes good catch just inside the rope
short slower ball, he swings hard and gets a thick edge that runs to fine third man!
short slower ball, he's back and pulling through square leg for a couple
he backs away and slaps this through cover but can't beat the man on the ring
shorter slower ball, he tries to pull but cops it on the body and it rolls away for a leg bye
shorter slower ball, he mistimes a pull towards long on
141kph, length ball angled into the pad, it runs fine to the keeper and they pinch a leg bye

caught at deep midwicket! Maddinson had two bites but hung on! A length slower ball, Lenton takes a big swing and launches it high to deep midwicket, Maddinson runs in and calls Maxwell out, he needs to bites but doesn't panic and holds on
144kph, full and straight, he swings hard and drags it to deep midwicket
slower ball, 120kph, he backed away and tried to heave but misses
bouncer, over middle, he backs away and ducks late. That was rapid!
brilliant slower ball to finish it. Another swing and miss
